actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1012.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #224 (357-1).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation, S. Rept. 95-971.

official_title: An Act to amend section 216(b) of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from the District of Columbia, Guam, and the Virgin Islands to make nominations for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1012) Amends the Merchant Marine Act of 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from Guam, and the Virgin Islands to nominate one individual each and from the District of Columbia four individuals for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 216(b) of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from Guam and the Virgin Islands to make nominations for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy.

An Act to amend section 216(b) of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from the District of Columbia, Guam, and the Virgin Islands to make nominations for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy, and for other purposes.
